name: selectFromMin
description: Selects the event with the minimum value of a specified field within each group, and includes additional fields from that event. Used within groupBy() to get the oldest event (or event with lowest value) along with its associated fields.

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: Field to find the minimum value of (typically @timestamp for oldest event)

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Array of field names to include from the selected event

examples: | groupBy([aid, ComputerName], function=selectFromMin(field="@timestamp", include=[UserSid, UserName, ImageFileName, CommandLine]))
notes: Returns fields from the event with the lowest value in the specified field. Opposite of selectFromMax.
